skills: Merchandising, Communication Skills, Sales, Retail, Customer Service, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Multitasking
summary: Visual Merchandiser committed to staying current on market trends and consumer interests. Collaborates with management to create the best product plans and boost sales revenue, while delivering exceptional customer experience.
work_experience: As a Set Designer from Jan 2014 to Current, this individual creates concepts and crafts sets for T.V. Commercials, websites, newspaper advertisements, brochures, and company magazines. Responsibilities include selecting furniture, accessories, draperies, wall art, and props, ensuring proper set breakdown and disposal, collaborating with Art Directors and photographers, and making adjustments during shooting and filming. Previously, as a Visual Merchandiser from Jul 2011 to Jan 2014, they coordinated merchandise placement, conducted inventories, developed in-store displays, communicated with management for customer feedback, coordinated new product integration, managed specific product selections, revamped showrooms, created floor plans for customers, and completed residential and assisted living design projects. From Aug 2008 to May 2010, as a Head Resident Advisor, they served as a staff leader and peer mentor, assisted with RA training, coordinated Residential Security Aide training, directed students to support resources, collaborated with Residence Life staff to promote positive development, responded to student crisis situations, and fostered a positive environment in residence halls.
